title: Flashbacks and Echoes
description: How do you live in a world in which everything is an illusion? How do you move on, when the flashbacks of your past won't stop hunting you?An emotional story about friendship, love, family drama, heartbreak and growing up. Or something like that.Kat's life has been picture-perfect since she can remember. Now it's time for her to write her own story, moving across the country to start college with her best friend. New city, new friends and a mysterious dark-haired boy who turns her world upside down.Kat's more of an introvert, she's never really been in love and rather reads books than goes to parties. She a realist, believing that earth-shattering love exists only in fiction - until she meets Noah. The tall handsome boy, with the darkest eyes and brightest smile she's ever seen. He has demons of his own, but together they can get through it all. Obviously.For a while, she's been suspecting that something is wrong with her brother Kyle and her parents. After finding out her life wasn't as perfect as she believed, everything changes. Her brother, her parents, even her best friend had been lying to her.Sometimes forever isn't as long as we'd hoped and when it ends, it comes crashing down, destroying everything in its path. And it hurts like hell.
author: Tina Klement
